bug.author: zhenghuiwang
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I tried to generate new change logs for v0.6 releases by running scripts/update-changelog.sh with my personal Github token, but the script failed with errors <denchmark-code>RETRY - Octokit::AbuseDetected: 'GET https://api.github.com/repos/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/2022/events?per_page=100: 403 - You have triggered an abuse detection mechanism. Please wait a few minutes before you try again. // See: https://developer.github.com/v3/#abuse-rate-limits' </denchmark-code>
Tried to use --since-tag flag to reduce the traffic, but still hit the rate limit of Github. Seems related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/github-changelog-generator/github-changelog-generator/issues/656>github-changelog-generator/github-changelog-generator#656</denchmark-link>

I'm going to close this issue, as it's not relevant for the website docs. Please do re-create the issue in kubeflow/kubeflow to track work if need be. /close
